name: Chapter 4: The Pond
short_description: The group explores the pond, marveling at the newfound space and freedom. They meet new aquatic friends, who introduce them to the dangers of the outside world. Bubbles remains determined to reach the ocean.
events: Exploration of the pond, meeting new friends, learning about outside dangers.
people: Bubbles, Finley, Lola, Guppy, New Aquatic Friends
from_prev_chapter: They escaped the pet store and made it to the pond.
to_next_chapter: The group decides to continue their journey.
